attributes.action: Stop the benefits of Anjam Chowdary and Muslim4Uk members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: anjam chowdary has in his own words said that britain is a "corrupt nation." while sprouting his hatred he is drawing benefits in excess of £30,000 per year. muslim4uk and other groups are encouraging hate and have expressed hate for our country while living at the our expense. if we are such a corrupt nation then he must believe that our benefit system is also corrupt. we believe that he and his followers are committing treason with their preaching should not be allowed to draw benefits at the expense of the tax payers while some of our service personel live below the breadline.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions relating to an individual's circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
